document.masterDocTitle: Two new species of Prionocyphon Redtenbacher from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Scirtidae), with notes on Prionocyphon, Mescirtes Motschulsky and Prionoscirtes Champion from East and Southeast Asia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Two new species of Prionocyphon Redtenbacher from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Scirtidae), with notes on Prionocyphon, Mescirtes Motschulsky and Prionoscirtes Champion from East and Southeast Asia

bibRefCitation.author: Redtenbacher
bibRefCitation.refString: Redtenbacher, L. (1858) Fauna Austriaca. Die Kafer. Nach der analytischen Methode bearbeitet von Ludwig Redtenbacher. Zweite, ganzlich umgearbeitete, mit mehreren Hunderten von Arten und mit der Charakteristik sammtlicher europaischen Kafergattungen vermehrte Auflage. Wien, 1 - 1017.

Champion, 1897

Champion, 1918
Malay
Peninsula, Penang

* It is still uncertain if
Prionocyphon fuscipennis
is a synonym of
P. ovalis
, as suggested by
Yoshitomi ( 2005 )
. The type of
P. fuscipennis
was not available for this study.
